short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn japanese while watching your favorite movie/anime with this Chrome Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hey, my name is Said and I built this chrome extension for me but it might be also useful for you !

I am just doing this for fun, if you found it any issue please let me know :)

Currently supporting : AmazonPrime (video) and Youtube.

Why Sabutaitoru?
Sabutaitoru is designed with the Japanese learner in mind, offering targeted support for kanji comprehension, vocabulary relevance, and interactive learning. Perfect for all levels, from beginner to advanced, it helps bridge the gap between passive watching and active language learning.
